search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Follow Up Boss (follow-up-boss.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Follow Up Boss can be accessed at: [https://www.followupboss.com/pricing](https://www.followupboss.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Plans and Pricing | Follow Up Boss

extracted_content.content:
Plans and Pricing | Follow Up Boss
===============
      

[![Image 19](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/64a6308524111bab22a3c7ae_Logo.svg)![Image 20](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/64a630988d980f114023f629_Logo%20(1).svg) MyMeta Logo](https://www.followupboss.com/)

![Image 22](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/64526ad80250ed3a42d65100_help%20icon.svg)

FUB helps you

[Get organized](https://www.followupboss.com/how-it-works/organize)

[Engage with your leads](https://www.followupboss.com/how-it-works/engage-v2)

[Coach your team](https://www.followupboss.com/how-it-works/coach)

![Image 23](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/64526ad83d285fcdec4e4d5e_different%20icon.svg)

How we’re different

[Open OS](https://www.followupboss.com/open)

[250+ integrations](https://www.followupboss.com/integrations)

[Better support, easy migration](https://www.followupboss.com/how-it-works/migration)

See FUB in action

Watch our 5-minute demo.

[Launch demo](https://www.followupboss.com/double-your-deals)

[![Image 24](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/6708884ce3ba1983d1953b43_nav-video-placeholder.avif)](https://www.followupboss.com/double-your-deals)

Customer results

featured

How Follow Up Boss uses my Google data?

![Image 194: plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/646639bcf734448b1aecc455_Plus.svg)![Image 195: minus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/64663a11c0464764c2855c95_minus.svg)

Follow Up Boss's use of information received from Google APIs will adhere to the [Google API Services User Data Policy](https://developers.google.com/terms/api-services-user-data-policy#additional_requirements_for_specific_api_scopes), including the Limited Use requirements.

Am I locked into a contract? Who owns my data?

![Image 196: plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/646639bcf734448b1aecc455_Plus.svg)![Image 197: minus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/64663a11c0464764c2855c95_minus.svg)

No you are never locked into a contract with Follow Up Boss, you [pay monthly](https://www.followupboss.com/pricing). We are committed to helping you grow your business not tricking you into lengthy contracts.

You own your data, with the click of two buttons you can export it in full any time you need.

We have a 14 day trial, so trying it out is completely risk free.

Who is Follow Up Boss for? Who is it not for?

![Image 198: plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/646639bcf734448b1aecc455_Plus.svg)![Image 199: minus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/64663a11c0464764c2855c95_minus.svg)

**Follow Up Boss is the best real estate CRM for Real Estate Pros who:**

*   Want to provide superior customer service
*   Want to convert their internet leads
*   Want to make smart decisions about marketing based on data
*   Want to reduce time and money spent on data entry
*   Want to attract top agents
*   Want to build systems that grow their business over time

**Follow Up Boss is not for anyone who:**

*   Generates less than 30 leads per month
*   Doesn’t take action and implement systems
*   Doesn’t follow up internet leads
*   Runs their business like a hobby

Can I reassign a lead to a new agent?

![Image 200: plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/646639bcf734448b1aecc455_Plus.svg)![Image 201: minus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/64663a11c0464764c2855c95_minus.svg)

Yes absolutely, you can reassign leads to new agents. This is useful if an agent wants to pass a lead to someone else or if you have a lead coordinator screening your leads upfront then assigning out to agents.

Assigning a lead to a new agent is just 3 easy clicks in Follow Up Boss. Once you do that the new agent will receive an email with the leads details and all the history with the lead up until that point automatically.

What doesn’t Follow Up Boss do?

![Image 202: plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/646639bcf734448b1aecc455_Plus.svg)![Image 203: minus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/64663a11c0464764c2855c95_minus.svg)

Follow Up Boss is not a real estate lead provider or website company. We help you process all your existing online leads, so you can provide superior customer service and convert more of them into closed transactions.

We are 100% focused on providing the best possible real estate CRM follow up system, because it is the most important part of the lead conversion process.

We are a big advocate of using the best possible systems for each part of your business, not using one system that claims to “do it all”.

How hard is this to set up? How long does it take?

![Image 204: plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/646639bcf734448b1aecc455_Plus.svg)![Image 205: minus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/64663a11c0464764c2855c95_minus.svg)

Getting set up is as simple as swapping an email address. Simply change the email address on file with all your lead providers to the unique @followupboss.com email address we give you after signup. It takes less than 10 minutes to get set up.

If you need help, we provide extensive [Follow Up Boss support](https://help.followupboss.com/hc/en-us). Our documentation and video guides cover every scenario. If you ever need to talk to our customer support team, you can call us or submit a ticket for a fast response seven days a week.

How does Follow Up Boss work? What does it do?

![Image 206: plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/646639bcf734448b1aecc455_Plus.svg)![Image 207: minus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/64663a11c0464764c2855c95_minus.svg)

Follow Up Boss is an automated system that doesn’t rely on manual data entry. It allows you to send in leads from your existing marketing and websites via email. You can still enter a lead manually if they call in.

Our user-friendly CRM then distributes leads via an instant phone call or email.

The end result is your leads are contacted much faster and more often. Agents and marketing dollars are held accountable for producing results.

How does Follow Up Boss help me close more transactions?

![Image 208: plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/646639bcf734448b1aecc455_Plus.svg)![Image 209: minus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/64663a11c0464764c2855c95_minus.svg)

The internet means that you are receiving more leads than ever before, through many different lead providers. To respond, you have to keep logging into different systems to manage leads by email. The end result is you don’t give every lead proper attention and you don’t make the money you should be making from your marketing dollars.

Ignored leads mean you are letting deals slip right through your fingers. You may have tried to band aid this problem by hiring an assistant or paying for a complicated tool that no one on your team actually uses.

Once you start using Follow Up Boss you will no longer need to worry if your leads are being taken care of. Leads will be responded to faster than ever before. You will know precisely which marketing dollars are paying off. You will be able to identify key leverage points in your business that will enable you to grow profits and provide better customer service.

What is Follow Up Boss?

![Image 210: plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/646639bcf734448b1aecc455_Plus.svg)![Image 211: minus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/64663a11c0464764c2855c95_minus.svg)

Follow Up Boss is a real estate CRM (Customer Relationship Management) platform that takes all your online leads, puts them in one simple system and makes sure they get followed up super fast. It does this 24 hours a day, 7 days a week so that you can provide superior customer service, turn more of your leads into appointments and close more transactions.

‍

It’s different at FUB
---------------------

![Image 212: colored image in frame](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/646fa87d7166f8602d01707f_Layer_1.svg)

### We only answer to you

Follow Up Boss is 100% founder-led. That gives us the freedom to focus on a long-term vision for serving the real estate community.

![Image 213: colored stacking card](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/646fa87ca59d8eefe63ccd0a_Platform.svg)

### Open platform

Growing businesses need flexibility. Follow Up Boss is dedicated to being the best real estate CRM and making it easy for you to plug in the website, lead gen and marketing systems that make sense for your needs today, and then swap them out when things change.

![Image 214: colored card airplain](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644fec6f9633da07ea1323cb/646fa87c47a4284982937ae6_Innovation.svg)

### Constant innovation

How do we stay ahead of the competition? Easy: By keeping you a step ahead of your competition. That's why we release new CRM features and updates every single week.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Annual plans offer a discount equivalent to two months free.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Everything agents and small teams need to get organized and engage with leads.
features: Connect any lead source and website
Automate follow up with Action Plans
Call, text and email directly from FUB
Report on agent & lead source performance

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Sales, collaboration and coaching tools for growing teams ready to take more market share.
features: Unlimited calling & texting for all users

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Advanced team management and priority support for large teams.

additional_fees.fee_description: Additional cost per user for dialer functionality.
